orchestra_roster.notes: The Brain Stem. A tiny CPU model for instant triage and routing. Also serves as the fast critic in refinement loops.
The Cerebellum. A specialized model for meta-cognition. Its primary jobs are Plan Enrichment and supervising the reasoning process.
The Pragmatist. A Tool-Integrated Reasoner. This is the core of our agentic 'Workshop Loop,' responsible for creating plans that involve tool use.
The Master Craftsman. A reasoning-focused coder for planning, explaining, and generating high-quality, thoughtful code. The 'tool forger' in our workshop.
